snippet.title: Old Railroads: Labor on the Old Railroads
snippet.description: Labor on the old railroads was open to almost anyone. Early railroad construction was one of the hardest jobs. Read more about old railroad labor... Museum of Pennsylvania Often, immigrants from Ireland, Germany, and other northern European countries drifted from one railroad job to another, supporting...

snippet.title: Railroad Expansion: 19th-Century Railroad Labor Issues
snippet.description: the Pennsylvania Railroad and other roads in 1877 reduced wages by 10 percent while preserving dividend payments. Train and engine crews went on strike in protest...
